entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.3°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
